articles.author: Rajesh Pandey
articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S24's announcement and launch date details all but confirmed - Android Police
articles.description: Samsung has apparently confirmed the 2024 Galaxy Unpacked event date to Korean press
articles.content:
Summary
  • Samsung is expected to launch its Galaxy S24 series on January 17, advancing the event by 15 days compared to previous models.
  • The pre-orders for the Galaxy S24 will start… [+2986 chars]
